mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, event_code AS eventCode, consumer_name AS consumerName, topic AS topic, message AS message, status AS status, failed_reason AS failedReason, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM waybill_comsumer_event WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waybill_comsumer_event ( event_code, consumer_name, topic, message, status, failed_reason, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{eventCode}, #{consumerName}, #{topic}, #{message}, #{status}, #{failedReason}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE waybill_comsumer_event
event_code = #{eventCode},
consumer_name = #{consumerName},
topic = #{topic},
message = #{message},
status = #{status},
failed_reason = #{failedReason},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
